etomica.virial

Class ClusterWeightUmbrella

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.virial.ClusterWeightUmbrella
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterAbstract, ClusterWeight, java.io.Serializable

    public class ClusterWeightUmbrella
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterWeight, java.io.Serializable
    Umbrella cluster weight wrapper function. The umbrella cluster's value will be positive when any of the sub clusters have non-zero values. This differs from a ClusterSum mostly because the sub cluster values are not actually summed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
